inclusion.criterion: Clinical diagnosis of idiopathic Parkinson's disease according to the United Kingdom Brain Bank criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Sustained response to levodopa and presence of motor fluctuations for at least 1 h every day during waking hours
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Cognitive impairment according to Mini-Mental State Examination < 26/30
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Clinically significant psychiatric illness, including psychosis, major depression and addiction disorders (including compulsive levodopa intake)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of systemic mastocytosis with flares, but is otherwise healthy. She responded well to treatment and was discharged on her home meds.
